attributes.action: Get to grips with Anti-social Behavior that blights every town
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yobs are making nearly every town & city no go areas with Anti social behavior & drunken yob culture! Enough is enough Prime minister, do something before it too late. Raising the drinking age is NOT an answer as these people are just as bad sober, but they will just get other holigans to buy their alcohol for them! Every town is on the brink and this needs addressing now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
